Class javax.speech.AudioException 

java.lang.Object
  |

        |
        +--java.lang.Exception
              |
              +--javax.speech.SpeechException
                    |
                    +--javax.speech.AudioException
public class AudioException
extends SpeechException
Problem encountered connecting audio to/from a speech engine.

See Also:
